ModMetaData.name: DevInspector
ModMetaData.author: Belhun
ModMetaData.description:
The goal of this mod is to provide an ingame tool to explore the properitys with out haveing to leave the game, as well as being able to call apon the mod capture an object and its properitys to be able to explore them in game and learn about the data your trying to use in your own mods.
This mod was made because i hated doing the tedeus work of debugging the object information i was getting and trying to find out how i was suppose to navagate the data i was trying to use, while i know and even use a Debugger, i still find it teidus to find out what
